comment.author: 33775116@N00
comment._content: Saharet was an Australian dancer who made her New York City debut in February 1897. She performed in vaudeville music houses as well as in Broadway productions. Her given name was Clarissa Rose. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Saharet

comment._content: Maried Friedrich Wilhelm von Frantzius on June 23, 1913: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F0DEEDF153FE633A...
